div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio Eiusdem xvj
die Ocrobris Anno quo supra

Inquisicio facta apud burgum de Abirdene xvj die mensis Octobris anno Dominj
Millesimo quingentesimo octauo Coram honorabilibus thoma leslie thoma Waus et
Duncano colisone tribus balliuorum burgi de Abirdene' tenta in pretorio eiusdem
pro tribunali sedentibus per subscriptum videlicet Jacobum colisone Johannem mar Willelmum Wor//
met Matheum branche patricium rede Dauid steuart Dauid andirsone
patricium rede matheum branche Dauid theman Alexandrum malisone
Johannem andirsone Dauid kintor Johannem Kintor Willemum rollande Alexandrum
blinseile Alexandrum burnat' Willelmum st murray et Dauid straloche Quj
Jurati dicunt quod quondam dominus Andreas chamer patruus alisone chamer latricis
presencium obijt ad pacem et fidem domini nostri regis et quod dicta alisona est legittima
et propinquior heres eiusdem quondam domini andree patruj suj et quod est legittime
etatis ceteri punctj breuis patent in se quia non sunt terre neque annuj redditus

The said day It was sufficientlie preuit that Japhin carpenter franch//
man and William gray hade sellit to Dauid andirsone Dauid steuart
and Johnne arthour fyve twne and thre poncionis of wyne chosin considerit
and vndirstandin be honorable' men Johnne of cullan patry leslie Dauid
mar and george cuischingame' mastir vndir god of ane schip callit the
hoy chosin and suorne with consent of bath the saide partiis tharto and ale the salt being
in thar schip quhilkis the saide Japhin and alexander grantit opinlie to deliuer
to the saide Dauid and Johne Ande atour thai gef fre licence to the said franchmen
to sele and dispone apone the remanent of the gudis and merchandice beande in thair
saide schip

The saide day thomas chamer deliuerit to the bailyeis ane lettir of our Souerane
lordis vndir the signet to cale the ayr of robert gylespy befor thame anent the
redemyn of ane croft et cetera beseikande thaim to put the saide lettrez to execucione
Ande Incontinent' the saide bailyes assignit this day viij dais to the said thomas
and ordanit the officiaris to warne margaret rede and the ayr of vmquhile the saide
Johnne of gilespy To comper' the said day for ministracioun' of Justice

The said day alane litstar producit ane writ allegit ane decret gevin
betuix him one that ane part and William Walcar one that vthir part anent
the clame of the spillin of ane pece of clath et cetera quhilk writ the
said William denyit and saide he was neuir oblist to stande at
the deliuerance of the personis contenit in the samyn and the said d Alane
with mastir Androw patersone his forspekar tuk thaim to preive the saide
writ ane sufficient decret and that the saide William was oblist to
stand at personis contenit in the samyn be the fath of his bodie And thareftir the bailyeis
assignit this day xv dais to preive the saide alane to preive his
said allegiance

The said day thomas Watsone follouit Wilyeam Walcar and
alane litstar for the spilling of ane pece of clath throue thar werk
manschip et cetera quhilk wrang the said William denyit and the saide
Alane allegit the said actioun referrit to certane aribitouris and producit
his decret tharapone and held him at the samyn Ande thareftir the said actione
betuix the said thomas and William was put to the decisicioun
of thir personis vndirwritin Suorne in ane assis' that is to say James
colisone Johnne of mar William Wormet mathoue branche patry rede
William murray Dauid theman William Rollande Duncan fif Androwe
lowsone Johnne moir Dauid fynne Androw meldrum Alexander tailyeour
Dauid straloche Androwe stratoun quhilkis the gret aitht suorne
continewit thar deliuerance in the saide actioun to this day xv dais alle/
giand it was ane pertinent to the actioun contenit in the said alanis
allegit decret

Burgenses et fratres gilde tempore prepositure gilberti menyeis Anno Domini Millesimo
quingentesimo Octauo

Andreas Durty scissor recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito Solito Juramento Ac Soluet decim
s' pro quibus thomas Waus deuenit fideuissor thome lesie decano gilde anni preteriti
quia factur fuit burgensis in die Curie capitalis eiusdem anni preteriti
Alexander akmane coupar recipitur in liberum burgensis prestitio Solito Juramento Ac soluet decim s' Johanni
Colisone et Johanni mar' decanis gilde annj Instantis in festo Sancti Johannis baptiste pro quibus
thomas Waus et Dauid steuart deuenerunt fideuissores
richardus litstar recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito Soluto Juramento ac Soluet
xx s' pro quibus Willelmus portar deuenit plegius
Robertus litstar Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito Solito Juramento
ac soluto quinque in alba bursa
Willelmus turing gracia Consilij recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Solito
Juramento Ac Soluet xiij s' et iiij d' residuum remittitur et cetera ad Instanciam thome Waus
Johannes michelsone pistor Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito solito
Juramento ac Soluto quinque s' in alba bursa
Thomas gregory Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito solito
Juramento ac Soluto quinque s' in alba bursa ut moris est
Jacobus nevmane in Campueris gracia prepositi et Consilij recipitur in liberum burgensem et
fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento
georgius meldrum dominus de fywe Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem
gilde Soluto quinque s' in alba bursa prestito Solito Juramento attamen se cum dispensatur
de lott scott waik and warde
Robertus Andirsone filius Johannis andirsone recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem
gilde prestito Solito Juramento ac Soluto quinque s' in alba bursa
Alexnder neysche gracia prepositi et consilij ad requestum Andree elphinstone
de Selmys recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento
ac Soluto quinque s' in alba bursa
Malcolmus nachty recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde quia sponsauit
filiam quondam Dauid Ratre burgensis huius burgi prestito Solito Juramento ac Soluto quinque
s' in alba bursa
Willelmus gray recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde gracia prepositi decanorum
gilde ac diuersorum consilij Ac Soluet xl s' decanis gilde prestito Solito Juramento
et Soluto quinque s' in alba bursa
Johannes glas' scissor recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito Solito Juramento et cetera
patricius ramsay ad Instancam Andree elphinstone de selmys recipitur
in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento ac Soluto v s' in alba
bursa
Thomas bothie recipitur in liberum burgensem quia sponsauit filiam
burgensis prestito solito Juramento
Andreas Kintor recipitur in liberum burgensem er fratrem gilde Jure paternitatis prestito
Solito Juramento ac soluto v s' in alba bursa
Willelmus gray filius Alexander gray recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem
gilde Jure paternitatis prestito Solito Juramento ac Soluto v s' in alba bursa
henricus nicholsone recipitur in liberum bugensem et fratrem gilde Jure
paternitatis prestito Solito Juramento ac Soluto v s' in alba bursa
gilbertus Jonhnstone carnifex recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito
Solito Juramento

Curia balliuoum burgi de Abirdene Tenta In pretorio Eiusdem vicesimo die
mensis Octobris Anno quo supra

The saide day Androwe brabnar at the brig of polgowny was follouyt be alexander
Kintor for the wranguis' occupacione of his graitht ande bying of his fisch' and'
Inlikuis' for the wranguis' occupacione of alexander malysonis graitht ande
in bying of his fisch' quhilkis he denyit Ande the bailyeis assignit monunday that nixt
cumis to the said alexander and alexander to preif that said allegiance

The said day William couopar tailyeour was in amerciament of the court in defalt of
presence as he that was lauchfully warnit and nocht comperit tile ansuer for the
tribulance of Johnne Watsone

The said day alexander thekar grantit him tile entir to Johnne colisonis werk
one monunday that next cumis ande to complet the samyne thai fyndand him
stuf

The said day robert murray oblist him to mak his dikis sufficient to kep
his nychtbour skath within dais hereftir

The saide day g Andro fyf grantit him aving to William Wormet half
ane vnicorne of golde quhilk the bailyeis chargit him to pay within terme of
lawe

Curia Balliuorum burgi de Abirdene Tenta In pretorio Eiusdem
vicesimo primo die mensis Octobris Anno quo supra

The saide day alexander buk was conuikit for the haldin of ane wranguis' pek
et cetera ane selling of his merchandice with the samyne

The saide day thomas vmfray baxtar was conuict' be his avin tvng
grant for the brekin of the pais in baikin of bred of quhet for the quhilkis
the saide thomas was in ane amerciament of the court et cetera

The saide day Johnne andersone deponit the gret aitht that the strak bede
thre glasin wyndois ande the star passande to the loft in the hous' quhar'
henry bavne duellis was bocht bigit ande put thair be Johnne of
meldrum one his avin expens' and was neuir allowyt in his maile

The saide day malle Antone the wif of Syme flesar the wif of Alexander
lammyntone the wif of patry raite was conuict' for brekin of common ordi/
nance in makin ande selling of candile et cetera

The saide day alexander blayer grantit him to pay to Dauid tailyeour and'
Donalde baxtar xx s' for tua batfull of eldin aving to thame'

Curia Balliuorum burgi de Abirdene Tenta In pretorio Eiusdem xxiijo die
mensis Octobris Anno quo supra

The saide day gichtane the spous' of criste prat was conuict' be
ane suorne assis' Androwe fyff forspekar for the wranguis' our bying
in malt of Marioun Kintor the spous' of Johne raburne for the quhilkis
scho was in ane amerciament of the court et cetera and tile amende as law wile and to
forber' in tym to cum

The saide day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane assis' Androwe fyf forspekar that
Adame Wer wrangit that he opinnit nocht his loft dur at the commande of
Duncane colisone bailye to schewe his stane gif It held the richt wecht when
he was requirit tharto be androw nachtj officiar for the quhilkis he was in amerciament of the
court et cetera and tile amende as lawe wile and forber' in tym to cum

The saide day Adame Wer was conuict' be ane suorne assis' Androwe
fyf forspekar for the tribulance of Duncan colisone in word for the quhilkis the
saide Adame was in amerciament of the court et cetera and tile amende as lawe wile and forber'
in tym to cum et cetera Ande the saide Duncan quyt of ale tribulance of the saide adam
and of ale wranguis' bying and Intrometting of ale merchandice wole skyne
et cetera fray the saide Adame is calandis

The said dat Adame Wer was quyt be ane suorne assis' Androw fyf for/
spekar for the haldin of ane wranguis' pek and selling thar wtih et cetera

The saide day the court wardit schewe for lawe ande It was gevin for dome
that alexander Kintor had preuit Sufficientlie that alexander brabnir had fischit the wattir
of Done pertening to alexander Kintor in malyng ande slane fische thar in et cetera
ffor the quhilkis he was in ane amerciament of the court and tile amende as lawe
wilde ande forber' in tyme to cum

The said day thomas menyheis was quyt be the said assis' for the tribu//
lance of the franche cheild in the franchmannis schip

Curia Balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio Eiusdem xxvijo
die mensis octobris Anno quo supra

The said day It was deliuerit be ane suorn assis' ser Johne' ruthirfurd forspekar
that Williame Wellis is aving to Johne cullan xl fethir of petis ande the saide Johnne
is quyt of ane barrel of salmonde clamit be the said William

The saide day alexander horn was conuict' be ane suorne assis ser Johne'
ruthirfurd forspekar for tribulance of alexander burnat and the saide alexander
burnat for tribulance of alexander horne et cetera Ande the saidis alexander and alexander
was conuict' for tribulance of the prouestis hous' and th prouotacioun of the
saide tribulance was fundin in the saide alexander horne for the quhilkis the
saide alexander and alexander Ilkane of thame was in tua amerciamentis of the court

Eodem die alexnader king plegios legales per manus sue dextre ostensionem
quod Alexander horne erit indempnis pro eo aliter quam per viam Juris Et dictus alexander horne
inuenit patricium chernsid plegium legalem quod prefatus alexander burnat erit indempnes
pro eo aliter quod per viam Juris Et quemlibet dictarum parcium obligatur ad conseruandum suos
plegios indempnes de huismodi fideiussione

The said day the assis' continewit the mendis to be maid betuis
alexander horne and alexander burnat anent the strublance betuix thame
and for strubulance of the prouostis hous' with consent of baith the partijs to
mononday that next xmmys and ordanit baith the said partijs be thar
the said day

Curia Balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio Eiusdem pen//
ultimo die mensis Octobris Anno quo supra

The saide day It was fundin ande deliuerit be ane suorne assis' ser Johnne
ruthirfurde forspekar that Williame Walcar at the mylne of Drum is quyt and
fre of the spilling of ane pece of clath follovit ande persewit be thomas Watsone
burges of the saide burgh'

The saide day It was deliuerit ordanit and furtht gevin be the Counsale
anent the amendis for the tribulance and offence done betuix Alexander horne
and Alexander horne and for Amendis of the tribulance of the aldirmannis hous'
that the saide Alexander horne sale ask the said' alexander burnat forgiwnes in the
court and he the saide alexander horne et cetera and bath ask the aldirman forgiwnes And'
he saide alexander horne sale pay to the haly blud licht four' lib' of wax and the
saide alexander burnat tua lib' of wax et cetera ande gif ony of thame Offendis
tile vthir in tyme to Cum and beis conuict' tharof sale pay xl s' to the halyblud
lich vnforgevin to the kepin' of the quhilkis bath the said partiis ar' oblist
tile vthiris be the fathtis of thar bodeiis
